org.mapsforge.android.maps
Class MapZoomControls

java.lang.Object
  org.mapsforge.android.maps.MapZoomControls

public class MapZoomControls
extends Object

A MapZoomControls instance displays buttons for zooming in and out in a map.

isShowMapZoomControls

public boolean isShowMapZoomControls()
Returns:
true if the zoom controls are visible, false otherwise.

setShowMapZoomControls

public void setShowMapZoomControls(boolean showMapZoomControls)
Parameters:
showMapZoomControls - true if the zoom controls should be visible, false otherwise.

setZoomControlsGravity

public void setZoomControlsGravity(int zoomControlsGravity)
Sets the gravity for the placing of the zoom controls. Supported values are Gravity.TOP, Gravity.CENTER_VERTICAL, Gravity.BOTTOM, Gravity.LEFT, Gravity.CENTER_HORIZONTAL and Gravity.RIGHT.

Parameters:
zoomControlsGravity - a combination of Gravity constants describing the desired placement.

setZoomLevelMax

public void setZoomLevelMax(byte zoomLevelMax)
Sets the maximum zoom level of the map.

The maximum possible zoom level of the MapView depends also on the current MapGenerator. For example, downloading map tiles may only be possible up to a certain zoom level. Setting a higher maximum zoom level has no effect in this case.

Parameters:
zoomLevelMax - the maximum zoom level.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the maximum zoom level is smaller than the current minimum zoom level.

setZoomLevelMin

public void setZoomLevelMin(byte zoomLevelMin)
Sets the minimum zoom level of the map.

Parameters:
zoomLevelMin - the minimum zoom level.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the minimum zoom level is larger than the current maximum zoom level.
